text:
Uber | New York, NY | Onsite

Process: phone screen, 1 onsite interview, offer.

Uber Engineering in NYC is growing! If interested, please apply or reach out to Patrick Burke at pburke@uber.com

Senior Backend SWE - UberRUSH: https://www.uber.com/careers/list/21688/

Senior Fullstack Engineer - UberRUSH: https://www.uber.com/careers/list/25841/
